WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-SOUTH COAST.
DNC 01.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 14 JAN BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER CABLE
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   27-09.77S 044-05.55W, 27-39.02S 043-18.52W.
   25-56.50S 041-45.62W, 25-08.88S 042-20.00W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 3532/16.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 15 JAN 17.
